title: 6 Steps to the Perfect Morning Routine
itunes:title: 6 Steps to the Perfect Morning Routine
description:
Episode 569 - It has been said that the most successful people in the world have great morning routines. That it why it is so important, not only to wake up earlier than you are now, but to have a strategy for every morning. In this episode, I will dive into the 6 steps to creating the perfect morning routine from my good friend Hal Elrod's book "The Miracle Morning"

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
